title: Osis by Schwarzkopf Mess Up (3.4 oz)
description: This Matt Gum Paste gives a trendy matte appearance. Rub it in. Smooth it down. No mess. No fuss. A fibrous finishing cream, which gives a matt finish for the latest textured looks. Go natural, go wild, express yourself! OSIS, Mess Up,the styling gum for the fashion forward who like their styling funky, piece-y, or chunky. Contains beeswax, the anti-oxidant that provides barriers against moisture loss. Matte finish, medium hold, texture. (3.4 oz)

title: Mistral Shea Butter Soap, Gardenia, 7-Ounce Bar
description: Hand-crafted in the heart of Provence, France, Mistral soaps are made according to a three-hundred year old tradition of purity and excellence. Following a time honored know-how, or "savoir-faire," we produce the finest triple milled soaps in the world by carefully selecting the highest quality oils of olive, palm or coconut and combining them with skin-softening African shea butter, renowned for its protective, rejuvenating properties. Our quality craftsmanship produces pure vegetable soaps praised for their rich lather, silky texture, and exquisite fragrance.

title: Revlon Frost and Glow Highlights 16 Oz
description: Revlon Frost&GlowTM; is the easy-to-use, at-home highlighting kit that delivers natural-looking, salon-quality highlights. Whether you're looking to create subtle or dramatic highlights, our exclusive LightZonesTM cap makes application easy and uniform, and the new Create-A-Look Hook is dual-ended for increased precision to create a range of customized looks. Revlon Frost&GlowTM; is ammonia-free for maximum gentleness and has deep conditioners for optimal softness and shine.
